quiz.instructions: This quiz contains 20 multiple-choice questions. Each question may have 1, 2, 3, or 4 correct answers. Answer all questions to get your final score. When finished, type 'TERMINER' or 'FIN' to get your score.

questions.questionText: Which Google Cloud service is most suitable for processing and analyzing New York taxi trip data in real-time?
How can Cymbal Retail use BigQuery to gain insights into customer purchasing patterns?
options: Running SQL queries on sales data
Using BigQuery ML for predictive analytics
Integrating with Data Studio for visualization
